channel.title: Simon's Hotdogs Menu
channel.description: Serving the fanciest hotdogs in town. Come taste the tradition and creativity in every bite!

item.title: The Classic Simon
item.description: All-beef hotdog, ketchup, mustard, relish, and onions on a toasted bun. Price: $10.99

item.title: The Spicy Texan
item.description: Jalapeño sausage, spicy mayo, crispy onions, and pickled jalapeños. Price: $10.99

item.title: The Veggie Delight
item.description: Grilled veggie dog, avocado, tomato salsa, and microgreens. Price: $10.99

item.title: The Euro Dog
item.description: Bratwurst, sauerkraut, Dijon mustard, and Swiss cheese. Price: $12.99

item.title: The Sweet & Savory
item.description: Bacon-wrapped dog, pineapple salsa, and teriyaki glaze. Price: $12.99

item.title: The Clucky Crunch
item.description: Crispy chicken nuggets, honey mustard, lettuce, pickles, and cheddar cheese on a toasted bun. Price: $15.99

item.title: The Chili Cheese Supreme
item.description: Premium all-beef hotdog topped with our signature slow-cooked chili con carne, aged sharp cheddar cheese, crispy onions, fresh jalapeños, and a dollop of sour cream on an artisan brioche bun. Price: $29.00
